announcements.title: The Cathedral will resume regular Mass Schedule as of February 16th, 2021. Mass times below.
announcements.descriptive:
Due to Covid-19, we will be resuming our previous Mass Schedule at 30% capacity.
Our schedule will continue to be updated.

Parishioners are asked to review
[Worship Safe in Pictures and Points](http://peterboroughdiocese.org/en/resourcesGe…).

The televised Sunday Mass will continue on YouTube.
Check [Special events](#schedule2) below for information and links.

announcements.title: First Friday - March 5, 2021
announcements.descriptive: Adoration today from 8:00am - 12:00pm.  12:10pm Mass resuming today.  Stations of the Cross following Mass.

announcements.title: Join our mailing list
announcements.descriptive:
Be the first to know!
Stay in the loop with everything going on at The Cathedral.

Sign up to receive regular updates, announcements, links to bulletins, and more,
delivered straight to your inbox!

Let's stay connected.

[Sign up...](https://mailchi.mp/ac8e8cadb5e8/dont-miss-out)

announcements.title: Daily Lenten Reflection
announcements.subtitle: March 5, 2021
announcements.descriptive:
Building the Kingdom. Reflect, today, upon the mission given to you by our Lord to produce an abundance of good fruit for the upbuilding of His Kingdom.

Know that this can only be accomplished by prayerfully seeking out the way God is inspiring you to act. Seek to serve His will alone so that all you do will be for God’s glory and the salvation of souls.

Let us Pray… My glorious King, I pray that Your Kingdom will grow and that many souls will come to know You as their Lord and God.

Use me, dear Lord, for the upbuilding of that Kingdom and help all my actions in life to bear abundant and good fruit. Jesus, I trust in You. - Fr. Joshy George
